mapper.select: select distinct tbl_document.document_code as documentCode, tbl_document.document_type_code as documentTypeCode, tbl_document.document_title as documentTitle, tbl_document.document_content as documentContent, tbl_document.emp_code as empCode, to_char(tbl_document.document_date, 'YYYYMMDD HH:MI') as documentDate, tbl_document_type.document_type_name as documentTypeName, tbl_document_sign.sign_yn as progress from tbl_document join tbl_document_type on tbl_document.document_type_code = tbl_document_type.document_type_code join tbl_document_sign on tbl_document_sign.emp_code = tbl_document.emp_code where tbl_document.document_type_code != 'pj' and tbl_document.emp_code = #{empCode}

select distinct tbl_document.document_code as documentCode, tbl_document.document_type_code as documentTypeCode, tbl_document.document_title as documentTitle, to_char(tbl_document.document_date, 'YYYYMMDD HH:MI') as documentDate, tbl_emp.emp_name as empName, tbl_document_type.document_type_name as documentTypeName, tbl_document_sign.sign_yn as progress from tbl_document join tbl_emp on tbl_document.emp_code = tbl_emp.emp_code join tbl_document_type on tbl_document_type.document_type_code = tbl_document.document_type_code join tbl_document_sign on tbl_document.document_code = tbl_document_sign.document_code where tbl_document.emp_code = #{empCode}
